surface_layer.definition: Protein-protein interactions are the physical contacts between two or more proteins.

deep_layer.mechanism: Proteins interact through various binding mechanisms to perform functions within a cell.
deep_layer.origin: Evolved as a fundamental mechanism for biological regulation and function.

examples: Interaction between an enzyme and its substrate
Formation of protein complexes for signal transduction
